dct_description_sm: gravé par Lorsignol ; dressé sous la direction de J. Migeon ; escrit par A. Bizet.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "kilomètres".
Includes legend at top right: Echelles.
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation (including deserts), colonial possessions, islands surrounding coast.
Features telegraphic submarine cable lines and steamer routes (with distances), as well as tribal territories.
Pictorial vignette: Tanger/ Fillatreau del. Barbier sc.
dct_publisher_sm: Migeon, éditeur, imp, 11, r, du Moulin Vert,
